subject: Business
title: Make vs. Buy Decisions
description: A fast breakdown of Make vs. Buy Decisions for builders.

hook.text: Should Nike make its own shoes or hire factories in Vietnam? The answer shaped a $50 billion company.

buildup.text: The make-or-buy decision: produce in-house for control, or outsource for cost savings and flexibility.

discovery.text: Core competencies should stay in-house. Non-core activities can often be outsourced more efficiently.

twist.text: Outsourcing too much can leave you dependent on others for critical capabilities.

climax.text: The best companies outsource commodity work and invest in what makes them unique.

punchline.text: Make what makes you special. Buy everything else.

quiz.question: What should companies generally keep in-house?
options: Core competencies that make them unique
